```{r}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
weight2 <- import(here("data", "sesdata.rds"))
```

# First Draft
```{r}
weight2 %>%
  mutate(SES_bin = cut(SES, breaks = 3)) %>%  # SES를 5개 구간으로 나눔
  ggplot(aes(x = SES_bin, y = factor(calorie_label_usage))) +
  geom_bin2d() +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "blue") +
  theme_minimal()
```
